meanings.definition: Of or relating to a commission or commissioner.
meanings.sent1: The commissarial report was thorough and detailed.
meanings.sent2: She held a commissarial position overseeing the project.
meanings.sent3: The commissarial meeting turned into a lively debate.
meanings.sent4: His commissarial authority was unquestioned by all.
meanings.sent5: The commissarial duties required careful attention to detail.

meanings.definition: Pertaining to the duties or responsibilities of a commissioner.
meanings.sent1: The commissarial tasks were completed ahead of schedule.
meanings.sent2: Her commissarial role involved making important decisions.
meanings.sent4: In her commissarial role, she acted with fairness and integrity.
meanings.sent5: The commissarial responsibilities weighed heavily on his shoulders.
